requirements.summary: Provide a production publish checklist/instructions to trigger deployment of the current codebase without changing app behavior or UI.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is triggered for the current codebase.
The production site loads successfully and reflects the latest deployed version.
No functional or UI regressions are introduced as part of the publish step.

file_operations.description: Add a concise production publish runbook for the current frontend codebase: pre-flight checks, build verification, deploy command(s) using the existing project tooling, and post-deploy smoke checks (load, critical flows). Keep strictly documentation-only to satisfy the 'no additional feature or UI changes' constraint.

Add a short manual smoke-test checklist for production verification focused on existing user flows (app loads, unlock/entry flow, audio toggle, memories sections render). Ensure this document does not request or imply any code/UI changes.
